title: Facebook crashes Firefox tab, Win10
content: Facebook works fine on iPhone and iPad, and on Chrome on PC. Crashes ("Gah, your tab just crashed") when opening Facebook tab have been happening for a few days now. Also, when closing Facebook tab from Firefox, PC crashes (black screen) and reboots. Many other Firefox / Facebook crash complaints already made to Firefox, but not fixed. Pls fix urgently or I will be forced to cancel account, uninstall Firefox app and use MS Edge or Chrome as my default browser.
creator: terry_f

title: Gah. Your tab just crashed.
content:
The last few days Firefox 115.8esr started to give me a "Gah. Your tab just crashed." whenever I try to load somes pages, also sometimes it shutdowns as soon as a video is played in youtube.

Here's recenet Submitted Report IDs:

bp-de0d03ed-13d4-4dbf-9180-264f60240306 3/6/2024, 11:11 PM bp-1d1c1723-da9c-4a10-aec4-f3e450240305 3/5/2024, 3:34 AM bp-705c466c-f051-4ec7-a787-b71ae0240305 3/5/2024, 2:14 AM bp-c9656a28-c95e-4536-9339-7ddbe0240304 3/4/2024, 11:23 PM

Thanks in advance for your help.

PS/ disable hardware acceleration in Firefox, didn't fix it.
creator: salahforrobin
